Key Features of the Ubiquiti UniFi Access Gate Starter KitStarter kit with IP single gateway controller, G3 intercom, PoE++ adapter and PoE++ twisted pair extension for single gateway access control with Touch Pass supportWide range of inputs for gate, side door and emergency controlDIN rail mounting7" colour touchscreen (1024 × 600 px)Heading of the text sectionThe system uses PoE++ technology for power and communication, simplifying cabling and eliminating the need for additional electrical wiring.
